resources.string: In most cases, the problem is not cause by this app.
To saving copies, storage permission is necessary.\nPlease grant permission and try again.
Save the copy to Download/<app name>.

This app adds the \"%1$s\" action to \"Open with\" and \"Share\" menus. When you open or share a file with \"%1$s\", a copy of the file will be saved to the \"Download\" folder.\n\nIn order to keep your home screen clean, this app does not show in the home app (some systems may force the app to show). To uninstall, please go to system settings.
Save a copy for this file?
